name: GOIN
description: GOinfluencer is an influencer marketing platform which automates end to end influencer marketing cycle and makes running an influencer marketing campaign as easy as running a google/facebook ad campaign. Influencer marketing comes with its own set of challenges. There are two major personas: business owners and influencers. Taking a deeper look at the business owners, they have little knowledge or skills to run an influencer marketing campaign even if they want to. They do not know where and how to start and have very limited budgets for marketing. On the other hand, when we look at the influencers, they want to monetize their content and reach out to businesses for work. But they do not have an overall analytical platform in addition to not knowing how to grow on social media platforms. This is where GOinfluencer comes in. GOinfluencer Suite automates every step of influencer marketing process: Helps in creating highly focused and effective marketing campaign Within limited budgets Suitable for all businesses agnostic of size or market segment Helps in quicker customer acquisition and Builds trust and credibility
